title: I LOVE IT! Suggestions!
text: Hi! I love subway surfers, and love the characters and graphics. It helps me reach for a goal (the goal being to beat my high score.) It definitely has kept me entertained during quarantine, even though I have my moments where I get angry and turn it off, (I have a anger management problem) But I go back and play it even more. I’d love it more if there were more maps you could unlock. Like instead of (Im guessing) a map looking like New York (the current one) How about one on the beach side, Or safari, with golf carts as the “trains”. Or when you unlock a new character there’s a story to tell you more about the character, Like frank, he looks like a business man, maybe a spy. Just something that would be like a backstory to the characters. Love the game, I’m addicted to it! Keep it up.

title: Love it but there’s an issue
text: Ok so this game is phenomenal. I love how they include all nations and people groups. The characters and hoverboards look cool even though they cost a lot (but only a couple things are actual money). Since this is a game you can play without WiFi, it’s fun to play in the car or another place with no internet. However, my account has a problem. I used to play on another device, but when I switched the account to my new one, some items I had recently bought didn’t make it over (and they were still on the other device). Also, I can only collect coins from runs, none of the prizes I get from mystery boxes count. It’s frustrating and I would very much like that to be fixed. Sorry for the length of this I just wanted to make myself clear. Have a good day and keep making this game better!!!

title: 10/10 an emotional roller coaster
text: as i pulled up to the party in my crazy pink wig i downloaded this game. I got out of my mini van and went inside the small town cafe. I then see a sign saying that dixie dimelo would be singing her original song made by her “be happy “that day. I sat down and begin to play the game not focusing on the music playing. I then hear a ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ in the distant i stop for a while and see dixie singing. I then begain crying realizing that the characters in the game are just as her song says. “ᗷᕼᑌᗴᔕᒍYᗴᔕ 🤷sometimes✨i🙁don't😢wanna😱be😼happy🧚don't✋hold😇it🤪against😈me🙆” is the line that made me being crying. The characters are just teenagers who are troublesome because they feel as if they haven’t gotten enough attention in there life. So they cause trouble to stand out and draw attention.

title: Great game, but one bug
text:
I love this game. I’ve had it for long time. However, one time I opened the app and it wouldn’t load. I tried countless times to see if it was just that one time but it still wouldn’t load. I tried updating it and even deleting and reloading the app to see if it would load, but it still wouldn’t. I don’t know if this problem is our bad WiFi or my phone or something, or if a bug in the game that won’t allow me to play. 
Don’t get me wrong, I love this app, I just can’t play it because of a glitch that I would like to see fixed. If you have any more suggestions on how I can try to get it to work, please let me know. This could 100% be a problem on my part, I just want it fixed. 
Thanks,
Anonymous

title: I don’t understand
text: I’ve been playing Subway surfer a lot due to my job being super boring and I have a lot of down time. The game play is simple and addicting which is why it’s my favorite time-waster. However, I don’t understand having a limit on how many rewards you can redeem in a certain amount of time in the season?! I put the hours in to get the tokens why are you forcing me to wait to redeem them?! That seems scammy to me, almost like you’re forcing people to have to “open” the game again at a later point which leaves a horribly bad taste in my mouth. I understand your whole “existence” is to have people spend as much money and time as possible on a simple mobile game but these types of practices are why mobile developers are looked at as a joke. Having to wait to redeem something on a mobile game is ridiculous.

title: This is a GREAT game
text:
This game is one the best mobile games out there, this is why. First of all the graphics. The graphics and art for this game is overall outstanding and I think should honestly get a reward. It’s super smooth and looks just really good. 
Second of all this game has so much entertainment. Subway servers is defenitly the best game to play when your bored. Like when your in a long car ride or just want something to do at home. You collect things, do tasks, and unlock new skins!
Lastly, the game updates a lot? And when they update they will add limited skins and change the map. It just makes it more fun to play because you can look at new things. 
So if you haven’t yet, I strongly encourage you to try out this game.

title: Few suggestions
text:
The game is fun and actually pretty good, but something that really frustrates me is that there is no way to have saved data. Like, if someone got a new device to play on and wanted to have the same data from before, they couldn’t “move” their progress to a new device. I think if accounts were an option on the game, it would be a lot better. Accounts don't have to be a mandatory thing, but it could be an option for the players in case they wanted to login on another device and have the same progress.
Theres also a bug on the game where sometimes when I move to the right or left lane, its like bumping into something and the cop catches up again. This can make it a lot easier to lose the round and is very frustrating sometimes.
I think those are my biggest complaints.

title: Game is awesome! 🤩
text: Everything about the game is so much fun, you can try to beat records though the game can be pretty hard as your score gets higher. It’s so funny to se people get angry like when Kai kenti’ a popular YouTuber getting very mad. The main goal in the game is to complete quests while running between trains and the point of doing the quests is to get money, you can see your quest’s if you start your run from the police and click the pause button on the top left corner of your screen and quests will show on your screen or you can see it at the start screen. I so far loved the game and have been playing for a very long time. Hoped this review helped you with the game and hopefully get you off on a better start.

title: My opinion of Subway Surfers
text: Well, it completes all my expectations of a good game. Like when I reach the end, I win a massive prize! Even though there is no end, which makes it the more fun! And there are missions, and you earn keys, and you can get a world record of the week! Keys are useful for lives, like the first time you crash, it’s one key or a video for free. The second time it’s one key, the next it’s two, the next is four, then eight, then sixteen, and so on, times 2. You get outfits, like fifteen keys equals one outfit in the character Tracy, so on. There are lots of characters and their outfits, so make sure you check it out by downloading the app! It is super fun, and it’s free! Thank you for reading my opinion on this game, and just so you know, I don’t give this kind of praise as easily.

title: Cool game, not good for kids
text:
Subway surfers is a fun game, to be sure, but parents should be very cautious.  

1) you MUST agree to disclose your personal device data to their ad network in order to play.  I applaud them for making that blatantly apparent, but there’s no telling what their ad network partners do with it.  

2) at least one way that they use that data in game to serve WAAAAY too many ads in my opinion.  Show an ad maybe before or after playing a game, no problem.  But this game shows ads while just browsing through menus (of which there are many).  Not only does this make for a poor user experience, it just seems greedy.   

3) several of the video ads I saw had a “false x” in the top right corner.  Those are out there to give the appearance (especially to children) that the user can press the X to close the ad.  You can’t.  Pressing that X is just like clicking the ad.  The times I saw it, the ads were for other games, so it would open the App Store.  I think this is borderline fraudulent and something Apple should be monitoring.   

So yes, the game is very fun.  I just don’t think the way ads are treated here that this game should be considered kid friendly and the age rating should be changed.  At the very least give me an option to pay for the game and remove ads and data tracking.  If that option exists in this game, I did not see it.

title: Fun Gameplay/Great Colorful Graphics
text:
This is a Great game that is really addicting. I am one of those people who makes fun of the idea of mobile gaming. I love pic games and nintendo systems. This game, However, is fun. It isn't complicated, but that is why its so fun. When I feel like relaxing and shutting off my brain for a while, I play this (or sleep lol) This is a great game that I definetaly suggest.

(It’s also a no wifi needed app by the way :D) I gotta say best game ever, and bruh I’ve downloaded crap, Believe me!! You can jump on top of trains, collect thousands of coins, use hoverboards, use jetpacks, etc. I would say at least 20 character/ outfits. This is that game that you want on your device trust me :)

title: Subway surfers(best game ever)
text: heyy, so i’ve been playing this game for like… forever and it’s one of my go to games. i love this game with passion, you get new characters if you get enough coins or keys etc. there are different hoverboards you can also earn. it’s a really quick and easy game, it ain’t to hard tbh(my opinion), it’s a game you’ll probably never get tired of, the more you play it the more you get better at it. me and my friends compare and see who got the most coins or lasts the longest in this game and i won, it was pretty fun. if i have nothing to do and i’ve looked through my other apps and i have nothing else to do i spend my time on this game, i hoped this helped or wtv but i hope you have fun playing this game!!!

title: A classic amazing game but….
text: Don’t get me wrong this is an amazing classic game but I have a few problems idk if it’s the game or just my devise but the game deletes my skins like all of them time to time with out me redownloading the app .another problem is I think the hover boards are getting way over price I think they should lower the price . title: Best Game Ever
text:
I think Subway Surf is one of the best games that you can get from this app store. It’s got so many amazing qualities that you just don’t really find in new apps. 

Whenever I discover a new fun app I always end up deleting it a few days later because it’s riddled with ads. Subway Surf actually is really good about NOT shoving ads down your throat. You’ll hardly even notice them. Plus, i don’t even mind them because Kiloo deserves the revenue.

The animation is top notch! It’s full of beautiful vibrant colors and really fun details. I love going through the subway and noticing small flowers or decorations. The characters are really fun and have lots of personality.

Kiloo does a few things to keep gameplay really fun. First, every month the game in set at a subway in a different city all around the world. It’s really cool to move around like that. Second, you can collect power ups in the game to give you advantages in the run. You can also collect coins that you can use to buy characters and hover boards with.

The game is perfect. Simple enough to understand, and hard enough to stay challenging for years. They don’t shove ads down your face and the design is eye candy.
Perfection.

title: The new upgrade is SOOOO bad!
text: When ever I start running the surfer becomes super glitchy and not as smooth as before the update. Many times my run has been cut short because the game froze, then glitched so that my character ran into an obstacle. I didn’t have a choice to update, the developers just auto-updated the app. The new graphics of the app are just so childish and waaay over cartoon-y. Another problem I have is that a red notification bubble stays in the top right corner of the “Quests” bubble. I click to see why there is a notification, and the bubble is proclaiming that I have completed 4 achievements. I’ve scrolled up and down and I have no achievement prizes unclaimed. The bubble is really annoying me and is very bothersome. The only other thing is that I hate how you have to scroll up and down to see the characters, rather than swiping right and left like before. Other than that the app is basically the same.

title: Simple yet captivating…
text: I used to play subway surfers about 3 years ago, and recently picked it back up. I really like a lot of the changes, such as the daily highscore and coin meter. On the contrary, the ads for revive feels like it should still have a key cost. High scores just feel false because you can revive so many times by just watching videos. The numerous ads while at the start screen are also irritating. The only other issue I have had is randomly my character will stumble while surfing side-to-side on top of trains. All complaints/bugs aside this is still an amazing game, and overall it has improved since I played 3 years ago. I would love to hear from the developer about any improvements that could be made in the aforementioned areas.

title: I don’t understand anything
text:
I know I’m kind of late to reviewing this update but I just started playing after a few months finishing school.

I know this game isn’t exactly aimed at older people and that it is technically a kids game. However those that have been playing this game since 2012 that’s actually still play are somewhat hurt and disappointed with the visual update. Visuals aren’t the problem though, with this update the game is slower to load and a little laggy while playing. The FB thing was said to be fixed however I’ve been signed out and don’t even have the option to sign back in, my first thought was maybe they removed the ability to connect with Facebook but that doesn’t really make sense. I don’t want to sit and complain because the basic game I grew up with is still here but so much has changed and it sorta broke the game.

title: Incredible
text: Seeing a game that ages well is pretty rare now a days, been playing it since the iPod touch and still playing to this date. Deleted and then downloading it and starting from scratch is annoying since the game should already be synced with the game center but i still manage to play and play to get the characters back. Nonetheless a very fun game especially when it’s Christmas themed their is something special about that since the og game was first redesigned for a Christmas theme, very fun to play while in the bus or in those long parking lot waits and thanks to the development team that puts so much time to always introducing something new. But for the love of God make the game sync with game center all of the characters and boards. But still giving it a 5 star.

title: Awesome subways surfers
text: Subway surfers is an outstanding game adds Don’t come up as much and this game is high-quality with the right amount of coins and keys!I Play this game every day when I get home from school I will get on my device and play subway surfers! About every month they change the setting which is very cool this game gets more skins and rewards!!You can get a high score and they give you a reward for that I think that if I could change anything about this game I would change how slow it goes in the beginning but it gets faster which is good!!! This game puts a smile on my face whenever I play it . I would say this game was made in Very great and detailed and worth trying! I really recommend this game to people that love action and traction!!!!!

I’ve played this game since back in 2012. Before it was a fun game where you’re trying to beat your friends scores and at the same time earn a ton of coins to buy the super nice skins. Today, as of 2019, this game has turned into more of an individual and forgive me but boring game because one doesn’t even play to earn the in game credits. All one can do is constantly watch 30 second adds and earn much more than one would have earned by playing the game itself. It is possible that such decision has been made by the creators due to the demise in popularity and profit from the game (definitely less than in 2013 but it is still up #7 in Action Games in App Store). I’ve always loved the gameplay and the game itself. I hope that it doesn’t continue going in the same direction. I hope it will not continue to be just about money making, I really do.
